column1: #text=It was my son 's birthday so I decided to bake him a birthday cake .
#text=I went to the store and bought chocolate cake mix , oil , eggs , and frosting .
#text=Then I set about making the cake .
#text=I turned on the oven to preheat it .
#text=Then I grabbed a big bowl to mix everything in .
#text=I put in the cake mix , the oil and eggs .
#text=Then I found the electric beaters and beat the concoction until it was smooth .
#text=Then I grabbed the pan that the cake would be baked in and greased the sides of it .
#text=Then I poured the cake batter into the pan .
#text=Then I put the pan into the oven that had been preheated .
#text=I set a timer to thirty minutes .
#text=When the timer went off I stuck a knife into the cake to see if it was done cooking and it was .
